A bit about me

I am a 24 year old Phd. Candidate in Applied Math at Tel Aviv University. My advisors are Shai Dekel and Nir Sochen. My field of interest is the Mathematical Foundation of Machine Learning. I am also a Team Lead at DeePathology.ai.
